hackathon-description-text: Welcome to Deltahacks III! We’re super excited that you’ll be attending our event this weekend and we hope you have an amazing experience. Whether you are a complete beginner or an experienced veteran, we are sure you will get something out of this event. We also hope our guests, sponsors, mentors and judges have a great time interacting with everyone. We know you’ll come up with awesome hacks and we have amazing prizes and swag to hand out to those that build cool projects. So get hyped for Deltahacks because we know that these next 24 hours will be full of wonderful things!
hackathon-eligibility: All university students above the age of 18 can participate. Maximum team size of 4!
hackathon-requirements: Submit by 11AM on Sunday, January 29. Include detailed project description, title, and all team member's names. Be sure to include links to your code from Github, etc. and any media you've created.
hackathon-rules: We abide by the MLH Code of Conduct. Please find that here:

hackathon-prizes.prize-content: The world of web development is constantly changing. Leveraging new tools and frameworks can make web development easier and make applications more powerful, but requires a strong knowledge foundation and the ability to learn quickly.
hackathon-prizes.prize-title: Best use of new web technologies or tools - Konrad Group

hackathon-prizes.prize-content: Awarded to the best hack related to the management of personal finance. Tour of RBC’s Innovation Lab and interview/pitch with RBC’s Technology Team

hackathon-prizes.prize-title: Best use of ArcelorMittal Dofasco API

hackathon-prizes.prize-content: Prize will be awarded to the hack that best helps patients maintain their diet and nutriton plans given by their healthcare providers. 1 TRNDlabs Skeye mini drone for each team member
1 Protocol Galileo Stealth quadcopter drone and lunch with Salim Jivraj, CIO with TD’s Channels Technology Solutions for Digital, ATM, and Phone Channels technologies
hackathon-prizes.prize-title: Best wearable finance hack - TD Bank

hackathon-prizes.prize-content: 1 Protocol Galileo Stealth quadcopter drone and lunch with Salim Jivraj, CIO with TD’s Channels Technology Solutions for Digital, ATM, and Phone Channels technologies
hackathon-prizes.prize-title: Best voice-navigation banking hack - TD Bank

hackathon-prizes.prize-content: Use your tech skills for good and hack online harassment! Build a software solution that can help reduce the frequency and/or severity of online harassment. Members of the winning team receive Hack Harassment Battery Packs!

hackathon-prizes.prize-title: Amazon Web Services - Best Use of AWS

hackathon-prizes.prize-content: Custom 3D Printed DeltaHacks Trophy + $100 Amazon Gift Card per team member + 30 minute consulting session with The Forge
Custom 3D Printed DeltaHacks Trophy + Tile Slim per team member + 30 minute consulting session with The Forge
Custom 3D Printed DeltaHacks Trophy + Razer Nabu X per team member + 30 minute consulting session with The Forge
